Key Match Events: Ivan Schranz scored the only goal of the match after a defensive error by Belgium in the 7th minute.
Romelu Lukaku had two goals disallowed by VAR.
Jérémy Doku lost possession in his own area, leading to Slovakia's goal.
Loïs Openda had a goal disallowed by VAR for a handball.
Post-Match Reflections: Belgium coach Domenico Tedesco refused to blame VAR for the defeat.
Tedesco discussed his team's tactics post-match, though they were difficult to discern on the field.
